resources.string: Good, keep on taking out those zombies!
Quick! Shake your device until the blue bar is gone to defend the zombie\'s attack!
Ouch! Try to shake your device until the blue bar is depleted next time so you don\'t take damage!
A virus has broken out! Quick, look around you using your device and swipe on the screen to take out zombies!
Great! Remember, you can\'t attack while a zombie has a hold of you.
Welcome back! Keep taking out those zombies!
Oh no! You died! Never mind, upgrade your stats with those zombie hearts and try again!
You don\'t have enough boss hearts!
Hoowee! He\'s a big one! Maybe if you beat him you\'ll get something good.
Woah! A zombie heart! They\'ll come in handy later, I\'m sure of it.
Ya know I run a shop around here. You can access it up the top and spend yer hard earned gold.
Buy an ability to deal some crazy damage, or indulge in some potions to recover health.
Use two fingers to swipe at once to use your ability!
Awesome! You gotta wait for it to cooldown to use it again though.
"Are you sure you want to clear all save data? This will wipe everything you've achieved so far and send you back to the main menu. No backsies! "
Be careful! These zombies can recover health.
These zombies will keep attacking without breaks! Use abilities to defeat them.
You wanna buy something? You\'re gonna have to wait, we\'re not open yet.
Upgrade your health and attack using the zombie hearts you\'ve collected and try again.
Rotate your device to find zombies. Once found, swipe at them to deal damage!
When a zombie is attacking you, they\'ll raise their arms and the device will vibrate.
When a zombie is attacking you, shake the device until the blue bar above their head is depleted to defend.
When zombies die, they drop gold. You should use this to buy items at the shop.
Abilities deal more damage than a normal swipe, but have a cooldown time before you can use them again.
Use a two finger swipe to use your equipped ability!
Once you\'ve bought an ability, if it becomes unequipped, you don\'t have to rebuy it on that run.
Sometimes you\'ll see chests spawn, you should tap these to get gold, zombie hearts or potions!
Potions recover your health. You can buy them from the shop or get them from chests.
If your health hits 0, don\'t worry! You can upgrade your stats using your zombie hearts and start over.
Zombies with blonde hair recover health, defeat them quickly!
